When you'd really be sick, you definitely won't have the energy to come here, but if you do, then you should know I'd probably be mad at you for being sick ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‚  but I would still say that I’m so sorry you’re not feeling well right now. I wish I could be there to gently run my fingers through your hair, bring you nice food and sit beside you until you fell asleep. But since I can’t, this letter is my little way of being there for you, from across this distance! ğŸ¤§

I know how often your body gets tired and how quickly you fall sick, and that’s why I worry because I care about you so deeply. If I could wrap you up in the softest blanket and take all the discomfort away, I would.

Right now, you don’t need to do anything except rest. Let your body heal. Let yourself pause.  Know that you matter a lot to someone out there  who's waiting for you to heal. ğŸ¥º

Close your eyes and imagine me right there beside you, whispering, "Sb thik ho jayega Umzy, suvi hai na tmhare pass" ğŸ¥º
I’m proud of you for making it through even the tough days.

Feel better soon, my love.
